sense.gloss: Japanese league, ri, old Japanese unit of distance, approx. 3.927 km or 2.44 miles
neighbourhood (under the ritsuryō system; orig. of 50 homes)
unit of area (approx. 654 m by 654 m)
hometown, birthplace, native place, one's old home
ruins, historic remains
village, hamlet
countryside, country
home (of one's parents, etc.), hometown
one's origins, one's upbringing, one's past
chogori, jeogori, short jacket traditionally worn by Koreans
undeveloped woodland near populated area
settlement pattern of living in upland valleys and cultivating lower slopes
1000 ri, (a) long distance
returning home to one's parents (of a married person), visiting one's parents (for a prolonged period of stay)
bride's first visit to her parents after getting married
coming back (of an item; after having been on loan, etc. abroad)
temporarily returning to one's home (of a servant)
foster parent, foster parents
(pet) caretaker
nautical mile
mountain hamlet, mountain village

sdata.j: ↑千里↑↓せんり↓の↑道↑↓みち↓も↑一↑↓いっ↓↑歩↑↓ぽ↓から。
sdata.e: Rome wasn't built in a day.

sdata.j: ↑千里↑↓せんり↓の↑道↑↓みち↓も↑一↑↓いっ↓↑歩↑↓ぽ↓から。
sdata.e: Rome was not built in a day.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓ひと↓つ↑間違↑↓まちが↓えば↑一↑↓いち↓↑里↑↓り↓も↑狂↑↓くる↓う。
sdata.e: A miss is as good as a mile.

sdata.j: ↑悪事↑↓あくじ↓↑千里↑↓せんり↓を↑走↑↓はし↓るって↑言↑↓い↓うだろう。↑悪↑↓わる↓い↑噂↑↓うわさ↓はアッという↑間↑↓ま↓に↑広↑↓ひろ↓まっちゃうのさ。
sdata.e: Malicious gossip spreads like wildfire. I guess that's why they say bad news travels fast.

sdata.j: ↑悪事↑↓あくじ↓↑千里↑↓せんり↓を↑走↑↓はし↓るって↑言↑↓い↓うからね。
sdata.e: Well, they say bad news travels fast.

sdata.j: ↑悪事↑↓あくじ↓↑千里↑↓せんり↓を↑走↑↓はし↓る。
これからどう↑会社↑↓かいしゃ↓を↑経営↑↓けいえい↓していったらいいのか、↑五里霧中↑↓ごりむちゅう↓だ。
sdata.e: We're all at sea about where to take our company from here.

sdata.j: この↑子犬↑↓こいぬ↓は↑里心↑↓さとごころ↓がついて↑泣↑↓な↓いているんだ。
sdata.e: This puppy is crying because it misses its mother.
The shepherd, even when he become a gentleman, smells of the lamb.

sdata.j: １００↑里↑↓り↓を↑行↑↓い↓く↑者↑↓もの↓は９９↑里↑↓り↓を↑半↑↓なか↓ばとする。
sdata.e: There's many a slip between the cup and the lip.
